Number of new reported cases in New York City over survey period

3,500 new reported cases

The first batch of emails were sent on Aug. 18.

By Sept. 1, the seven-day average was at one of its lowest points during the period, and the number of new reported cases was lower than nearly every day that the survey was active.

In the days before the survey was released, both the daily reported cases and the seven-day average appeared to be declining.
